title: Flores' GOITOBER Submissions 2023
content:

{{The GOITOBER List can be found}} {{[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023  here]}} 


[[collapsible show="+ Day 001: Richard D. Chappel (The Chicago Spirit)" hide="- close"]]

[[image Day01.png]]

 {{I like his character so much, cunning and charismatic at the same time. Makes me wanna read more tales that includes these GOI's.}} 

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Day 002: SCP-2719 (Ruiz Duchamp)" hide="- close"]]

[[image Day02.png]]

 {{Very Spooky, Love it! You either went inside or become inside.}} 

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Day 003: JALAKÅRA (Three Moons Initiative)" hide="- close"]]

[[image Day03.png]]

 {{Give these people a raise! I genuinely loved drawing JALAKÅRA.}}

[[/collapsible]]

[[image Day04.png]]

 {{I love fairy tales which means reading and drawing this tale takes the cake.}}


[[/collapsible]]

[[image Day05.png]]

 {{Love reading the tales! The art is inspired by the poster of the movie As above, so below}}

[[/collapsible]]

[[/collapsible]]
